name: MinerGame
description:
Intro

This is a relatively simple game where you are a miner, you're in a completely random and mysterious blocky cave system. The further you go from the safety of the center, the greater the riches and (eventually) the danger. You have a single merchant and he says you'll have to buy passage to other locations, and eventually your freedom.

Development

Currently, none of the constituent characters or materials have any personal graphics. There are no monsters. No continuation beyond simply earning.
